name: Old Fashioned
preparation: Add sugar syrup and bitters to a rocks glass, add ice, pour whiskey and stir gently, garnish with orange peel
personalImpression: A timeless classic that puts whiskey first

name: Whiskey Sour
preparation: Shake all ingredients without ice, then add ice and shake again, strain into a chilled glass
personalImpression: Sharp citrus balanced by warmth and body

name: Fig Whiskey Sour
preparation: Dry shake all ingredients, add ice and shake again, strain into a rocks glass
personalImpression: Deep fig sweetness elevates the classic sour

name: Blood and Sand
preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass
personalImpression: Unexpectedly smooth with smoky and fruity layers

name: Boulevardier
preparation: Stir all ingredients with ice until chilled, strain into a rocks glass over ice, garnish with orange peel
personalImpression: Bold bittersweet character with warming depth

name: Cuba Libre
preparation: Fill a highball glass with ice, add rum and lime juice, top with cola and stir gently
personalImpression: Easygoing mix with a clear summer vibe

name: Lucciola
preparation: Shake gin, liqueur and lemon juice with ice, strain into a glass and top with sparkling wine
personalImpression: Elegant and subtle with a modern herbal touch
